fullDescription: A video claiming that an armed group is roaming the remote hills of Chittagong Hill Tracts has circulated on social media. Investigation says, Kuki insurgents from Manipur, India.

description: Gold Medalist Alleges Improper Evaluation of Teacher Recruitment Exam Papers
fullDescription: An applicant named Maria Nusrat Sarker has alleged improper evaluation of written answer scripts in the teacher recruitment exam for the English Department at Comilla University. She is from the university’s first batch (2006–07 session) and the first and only Prime Minister’s Gold Medalist of the English Department.

title: টোকিও অলিম্পিক যাদের নিশ্চিহ্ন করেছে
description: Those who were wiped out by the Tokyo Olympics
fullDescription: Tokyo, Japan is now a city of festivals. Athletes from around the world, breaking and setting records, the sounds of victory and defeat, and the excitement of winning medals have been the daily story of Tokyo's Olympic Village for the past few days. But buried beneath this story is the story of the loss of shelter for many of the city's homeless people.

title: Comilla University Celebrates Its 16th Anniversary

title: Innovative Initiative in Comilla: Free Tea for Readers
description: Innovative Initiative in Comilla: Free Tea for Readers.
fullDescription: A bookstore owner in Comilla has launched a unique initiative offering free tea to customers who read books in the shop, encouraging reading while creating a cozy, welcoming atmosphere.

title: With Growing Fame, Sales of Manda in Mymensingh Have Increased
description: With Growing Fame, Sales of Manda in Mymensingh Have Increased.
fullDescription: It’s hard to find someone in the country who hasn’t heard of Muktagacha’s Mandar in Mymensingh. Loved for its taste and fame, this delicacy has crossed national borders, earning a spot among popular foods worldwide.

title: Overcoming Disability, Saidur Rahman Achieves Honors and Master’s
description: Overcoming Disability, Saidur Rahman Achieves Honors and Master’s.
fullDescription: When Saidur Rahman was a child, teachers initially did not want to admit him to school because he had a disability. This was one of the greatest sorrows of his early life. However, through sheer determination, he overcame his disability. The same child for whom school admission was once a struggle has now completed Honors and Master’s degrees in Public Administration from Comilla University and was pursuing an MBA.

title: ‘Anandolok School’ Means Dance, Music, Recitation, and Sports
description: ‘Anandolok School’ Means Dance, Music, Recitation, and Sports.
fullDescription: At Anandolok School, students engage in rural games and various sports. They also learn reading, dance, music, recitation, and handwriting skills.

title: Students in Cumilla learning martial arts for self-defense

fullDescription: Students in Cumilla learning martial arts for self-defense.

title: Comilla Agricultural Entrepreneur Successfully Grows Tea on Lalmai Hills as a Hobby
description: Comilla Agricultural Entrepreneur Successfully Grows Tea on Lalmai Hills as a Hobby.
fullDescription: When it comes to tea cultivation in Bangladesh, Sylhet is the first name that comes to mind, followed by Chittagong, as both regions are famous for tea. However, Tarikul Islam Majumdar has successfully experimented with tea farming on the Lalmoi Hills in Comilla. The entrepreneur believes that tea produced on Lalmoi Hills can not only meet the local demand in Comilla but also be exported abroad.

title: ভারতে মহররমের লাঠিখেলাকে বাংলাদেশের বিভিন্ন স্থানের সংঘর্ষ দাবিতে প্রচার
description: A video claiming to show a recent clash between two groups in Gazipur has circulated widely on social media. Similar captions have been shared across multiple Facebook accounts, groups, and pages.
fullDescription: The video is not from Bangladesh. In reality, it shows Muharram celebrations in Bastawara village, Bihar, India, but has been falsely circulated as footage of a recent clash between two groups in Gazipur and other parts of Bangladesh.

title: অন্ধকারে রাস্তায় পড়ে জখম তরুণী, ভাইরাল ভিডিওটির ঘটনাস্থল বাংলাদেশ নয়
description: A video claiming that a young woman was gang-raped at Teknaf Beach in Cox’s Bazar has been circulating on social media.
fullDescription: The video is not from Bangladesh. It actually originates from Bakultala area under Jaynagar Police Station in West Bengal, India.

title: বাংলাদেশ-ভারত সীমান্তে গানের প্রতিযোগিতার দাবিটি ভুয়া; ভিডিওটি ভারতের
description: A video claiming a singing competition between two sides at the Bangladesh–India border in Chapainawabganj has circulated on social media.
fullDescription: No such singing competition has recently taken place at the Chapainawabganj border. The video actually shows celebrations by the owners of two brick kilns in Muktarpur, Gobindapur area, Murshidabad, West Bengal, India.

title: শিক্ষার্থীদের ভিডিওতে আ.লীগের ড. ইউনূস–বিরোধী স্লোগান জুড়ে দিয়ে প্রচার
description: A video claiming that students are chanting slogans in support of Sheikh Hasina has gone viral on social media.
fullDescription: The video is edited. In reality, the students were protesting against a fellow student at Kadirdi College, Faridpur, in October 2024 over alleged derogatory remarks about Prophet Muhammad (PBUH). The footage has been combined with slogans from a rapid march by Jamalpur Awami League on 16 December to falsely suggest support for Sheikh Hasina.

title: ভারতে প্রথমবারের মতো শেখ হাসিনা প্রকাশ্যে আসার ভুয়া দাবি প্রচার
description: A video claiming that ousted Sheikh Hasina has appeared publicly in India for the first time has recently gone viral on social media.
fullDescription: The viral video is not from India. It actually shows Sheikh Hasina attending the state funeral of Queen Elizabeth II in the United Kingdom on September 18, 2022. The footage has been falsely circulated as her public appearance in India.

title: আষাঢ়ে গল্প; গণমাধ্যমের হাত ধরে কল্পিত অবাস্তব অভিনেতার বাস্তব মৃত্যু
description: Investigation into an unidentified claim about AI man died after surgery.
fullDescription: When this claim got viral at that time, so many media published report on it.

title: বঙ্গবন্ধু স্যাটেলাইটের ছবি দাবিতে ভুল ছবি এডিট করে প্রচার
description: Various images have been circulated at different times claiming to show Bangladesh Satellite-1. The most widely shared image features the satellite with Bangladeshi flags on both sides.
fullDescription: The image is not an authentic photo of Bangladesh Satellite-1. It is an edited image created from a satellite design stock image that was uploaded in 2005.

title: একাধিক নারীর সাথে প্রচারিত ছবিগুলো আসিফ মাহমুদের নয়
description: Multiple images and alleged Messenger chat screenshots have recently circulated on social media, claiming to show objectionable scenes involving Asif Mahmud, Youth and Sports Adviser of the interim government.
fullDescription: Investigation found that the images are not authentic, and the purported Messenger chat screenshots are fake. The content was created by collecting photos of different individuals from the internet and digitally editing them by placing Asif Mahmud’s face to spread the false claim.

title: Ancient Architecture of Basanta Raja at Cumilla

fullDescription: The News Report 'Ancient Architecture of Basanta Raja at Cumilla' was an assignment of 'Broadcast Journalism' course. Finally, it took place at MCJ 4th batch's News Bulletin.

fullDescription: The MOJO Report 'Preparations for Pahela Baishakh 2022' for MCJ News.

title: News Bulletin of MCJ 4th Batch
description: News Bulletin of MCJ 4th Batch was made by 4th batch students of Mass Communication and Journalism department of Comilla University.
fullDescription: This Bulletin was an assignment of course tutor Kazi M Anisul Islam and Monirul Islam under the Broadcast Journalism course.

title: Blacksmiths of Cumilla
description: This documentary is made as part of educational work. All videos captured with permission of all individuals in footage. The sunrise video and some music for this documentary are collected from the internet.
fullDescription: A glimpse into the lives and legacy of traditional blacksmiths in Cumilla, capturing their craftsmanship, resilience, and dedication to an age-old profession. This documentary highlights their daily struggles, skills, and cultural significance within the community. A heartfelt visual story created as part of an educational initiative.
